doc.repnme: Policy and institutioal reform for sustainable rural development : assessment of the training of trainers workshops and partnership in Africa
doc.abstracts: This study is meant to be a highly operational and forward looking study to provide a new direction to the ongoing program on Policy and Institutional Reform for Sustainable Rural Development in Africa that has been task-managed by the Environment and Natural Resources Division of the World Bank Institute. The study has been commissioned to respond to: 1) WBI's desire to scale up its training program through partnerships; 2)the need to assess a best type of expanding and strengthening partnerships in Africa, and particularly 3) the need to obtain more information on the effectiveness of the Training of Trainers (TOT) workshops in Africa.
doc.docna: Policy and institutioal reform for sustainable rural development : assessment of the training of trainers workshops and partnership in Africa
doc.display_title: Policy and institutioal reform for sustainable rural development : assessment of the training of trainers workshops and partnership in Africa
